title: Big-picture finance concepts can help inform personal money concerns, according to U-M business expert - University of Michigan News
content: Big-picture finance concepts can help inform personal money concerns, according to U-M business expert  University of Michigan News
description:
The subject of finance tends to suggest large-scale operationsâ€”stock markets, banks and the like.

Nejat Seyhun, a professor of finance at the University of Michigan Ross School of Business, has spent years thinking about how the lessons of his field can also apply to individual financial issues,
